root: ^Mom "Ok... how do you work this thing?

sc3_start: ^Mom "Wow, this looks so real. Um... where are the parental controls on this thing?
^Mom "Aw well, maybe it's all built in. It's marketed to kids after all...

c-0: ^Mom "TURN OFF! ALEXA! DEACTIVATE! STOP! CANCEL SUBSCRIPTION!
^Mom "Aaaah! How do you unplug this thing?! There's no cable! TURN OFF!
c-1: ^Mom "Ah, I don't know what I was worried about! It's just a kids game!
